vsParam:
I think this is "Bomb".
You put all of them of this wolrd in the barrel?

Yeah. It comes in handy when fighting against monsters or
clearing obstacles. It's very useful and used frequently.

To make transport easier, the Academy
uses barrels to make Bomb.

To make transport easier...
It does make sense given its usage.

Oh, I see~ I thought people who invented Bomb
put explosives in the barrel which became a tradition.

Don't be silly... although I thought so too.
Actually, many people thought so.

It's said the alchemist who invented Bomb came from
a family of barrel craftsmen... Something like that.

Oh, there is such a story...
And you even know that...

Good for you, Master Peppermint.
You're absolutely so good at alchemy!

Huh!? Ah, I'm impressive, huh~
Ha, haha!

I-I was not!
I never take wild guesses, hahaha...

Humph... Forget it.
Anyway, Bomb is the basis of fundamental alchemy.

Just remember how to make it and
that will help you make other items.

Even if you couldn't synthesize it now,
you should keep the recipe in mind.

Yes!
I'll keep it in mind!
